creator: Sertifier
descriptionHtml:
TURN LEARNING INTO A GAME

Verified is a masterclass learning app. Gamification included with CV and read. It is first of a kind mobile LMS.

LMS should be a living thing. It should be mobile and let you learn new skills. It should also include tools to verify skills. Highlight and bookmark all the important blogs that you read.
Verified Personalized Learning App is built for this purpose. We created the greatest mobile LMS to make you get rid of RSS Feeds.

You have been using Pocket, Feedly, Flipboard and all other RSS Reader App. Now is the time to turn them into a learning game.

Learn it, learn skills from the personalized and free content only curated for your interests.
Tell us about your skills and we'll tell you what to learn. Let us recommend new news, blogs and read every day. There is an infinite amount of news, blogs that can be read and watched. We will follow your skills together as you learn. Everything you learn will enable you to improve your skills. As your skills develop, so will your CV. You will have a living CV. Let’s turn learning into a game.
Constantly track skills development based on your peers and verify progress. The more you read and watch, the better results will be served for your daily feed. This is exactly what we are here for. By personalizing the in-app experience, you will achieve a better level of your professional progress and we will humbly assist you. We will support you to constantly read and improve yourself with a personalized learning feed.
We know, you are tired of searching the internet for things you want to learn. We know the LMS you are using is no good. LinkedIn, Medium, Pocket, Feedly or any other similar app gives you only blogs and news. We know you have idealistic friends who send you new content every day, and again we know that the content they send is not suitable for you.
We developed Verified to solve this problem. It is enough for us you to mention a single skill of yours. This skill can also be what you have or dream of having. We will have the rest. We are not talking about any imaginary product. There is no artificial intelligence or machine learning here. We will offer a combination of logic and research skills with technology.
We can prove that we know you better than you.
Why you should download Verified and start learning, highlight news and blogs?
- Find the skill that matches you best from a great pool of skills
- Nothing you have to do next, we will handle the rest. Start learning by turning it into a game.
- Stop searching for suitable reading or viewing content. We will curate, personalize then compile it all for you every day
- Be able to follow your progress instantly as you consume the contents.
- Reflect progress directly on your living CV
No more CV updates or worrying about "What to read now" lunch&coffee breaks.
Verified will constantly curate, personalize, and updated contents every day.
As you read, you will access more personalized content.
Verified Application Features
ATELIER: READING CONTENT CURATED FOR SKILLS
• Access to an unlimited number of skills
• Reading and watching content curation for each skill
• Better personalized learning content after each content consumed
JOURNAL: FOLLOW ALL PROGRESS
• Track all the content you read and watch
• Track your skills development daily
• Access the content you read and watch whenever you want
• View what your followers have read
PROFILE: REFLECT PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT ON LIVE CV
• Add professional background
• Rate and assess skills with what you have read and shared
• See the percentile with your skills scored based on peers
CURATION: SHARE WHAT YOU READ WITH THE WORLD
• Make every content you read always available
• Share all the content you find outside the app on your profile
• Let the followers accompany your personal development
The Verified app is the ideal place for personalized learning, reading, highlighting blogs and news.
descriptionShort: Turn learning into a game with mobile LMS, blog, news highlights and bookmarks

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Inspected LinkedIn, Feedly, Pocket and all similar products. Based on this, developed every bit of the application.

Verified Personalized Learning Application has a brand new learning experience. We turned learning into a game with the new feature set.

Read blogs and news daily, personalized for your skills. Daily notifications and digests are available.

Reach the greatest mobile LMS!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We are always changing and developing things in Verified, turn on your automatic updates to keep up to date!

title: Verified: Learn Skills Daily

creator: Sertifier
descriptionHtml:
*8 curated content each day

*AI usage for a personalized feed

*Filtered internet for your interests and skills

*Only tool to turn daily informal learning into verifiable badges to track progress, upskill, find a job or increase the salary

BETTER WAY TO SPEND YOUR TIME ONLINE

Reading a blog or watching a Youtube video can make you learn skills. This is informal and learning. Informal learning consists 75% of our whole learning And we’ve never taken into consideration informal learning while applying for a job or upskilling ourselves. Because there has been no way to prove it, until now. Further will allow you to develop and verify your skills with daily learning.

By using Further, users will get daily personalized feed according to their skills and interest. Also, all those reading and watching could be turned into verifiable credentials for those skills. Finally, users can paste all these verifiable credentials into their cv.

Half the time we waste online is consuming articles and videos that don’t serve our interests or skills. Further makes that time better spent by personalizing your web feeds to fit your specific skills and interests.
Turn Your Reading & Watching Into Credentials: Consider this to be a modern take on the resume, except it will no longer be just a static list of skills and experiences. Further is a platform that helps people build ‘verifiable credentials’ out of what they read and watch online. Instead of skimming for interesting content, you pick specific topics of your interest and Further search for matches across the web. Once it finds some stuff that you like, it starts curating a unique feed

Further helps you build a credible set of skills and experience from what you read and watch online. Instead of skimming for interesting content, you pick specific topics of your interest and Further search for matches across the web. Once it finds some stuff that you like, it starts curating a unique feed
Through Further, users can choose their source of highly valuable content, like Forbes and Youtube, among many other options. From there, the app will run 24 hours a day to put together a personalized feed based on the topics the user follows.

In the age of data, Further app offers skills-based feed to self-promotion. With skills-based content derived from your habits and interests, the feed is not only the best but also verifiable. Learn something new, including productivity tips or how to get ahead in life. It's not just content. It's credentials. Is it any wonder why you should try Further?
If you like to read and watch in pursuit of skills and knowledge, Further is your digital library. It surfaces the best content from publishers, blogs, and YouTube channels to keep you up-to-date on your areas of interest.
Further is like magic. It scrapes content from your favorite websites, YouTubes, online services like Forbes and Pinterest for you. Scraped contents are normalized and organized by skills and interests so you can visualize your accomplishments as professional portfolios. Further then creates a skills-based resume on the web.
• By using Further, users will get daily personalized feed according to their skills and interest.
• It is not only for reading the news but also for connecting with influencers and other communities.
• Also, all those reading and watching could be turned into verifiable credentials for those skills.
• Finally, users can paste all these verifiable credentials into their cv.
Turn what you read and watch online into an interactive profile. Further lets you quickly build your skills by searching for matches across the web without skipping out on what you find interesting.

Users can easily turn their regular watching and reading into verifiable credentials for their skills. Finally, users can place those verifiable credentials on their resumes to indicate the skills relevant to the job they are applying for.
descriptionShort: Turn daily reading and watching into verifiable learning with AI assistant

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We are here with a new brand! We've listened, listed, and reviewed all of your feedback over the past months. We've decided to do what's right for your needs. We developed Further with your support and advice. As before, we will continue to filter the internet and come up with content that may be useful to you. Much more useful interface, dark mode, ability to listen from text, creating lists... Skill-level badges and many more new features are waiting for you!

title: Further – Personalized Internet for Learning

creator: Sertifier
descriptionHtml:
Filtered internet for your interests and skills

Further is your mobile app for reading, learning, and sharing great content for Lifelong Learners. Why? Because we are lifelong learners too.

Further is an AI-powered app that filters and personalizes free internet content to help you learn faster, better. It saves you time from searching all scattered blog, video, and news sources while learning one skill. The app will show you how to speed up learning, focus your free time on what matters to you
Only tool to turn daily informal learning into verifiable badges to track progress, upskill, find a job or increase the salary.

Open your door to the world of free internet with Further, a mobile app that allows lifelong learners to filter and personalize content. Of course, you can read and watch as much as you want, but that is not it. You can read, learn and share with your friends. With Further, you learn while you're commuting, drinking coffee or going for exercise.

Our goal is to provide lifelong learners a mobile application that can filter and personalize the free Internet to their learning journey. The Further app allows users to read and watch online content that will help them develop their skills in various topics. That way, the user can focus more on learning and maintaining control over his data input.

Further is the best app for lifelong learners. Watch, read and learn every day wherever you want. Search for what you like!

Reading a blog or watching a Youtube video can make you learn skills. This is informal and learning. Informal learning consists 75% of our whole learning And we’ve never taken into consideration informal learning while applying for a job or upskilling ourselves. Because there has been no way to prove it, until now. Further will allow you to develop and verify your skills with daily learning. Focused learning for social, economic, and personal development.

Further is a mobile application that aims to help lifelong learners filter and personalize free internet. Instead of using Google News, Youtube, Medium or all scattered blog, video, and news sources now you have only one. Download Further, select your skills and Further will bring you blogs and videos. Read and watch videos to update your learning methods. Best productivity tool to enrich your skills without ads or bias.

-Further is the best productivity tool to enrich your skills
-Read and watch videos to update your learning methods

Further is a mobile application that allows lifelong learners to filter and personalize free internet. Instead of using Google News, Youtube, Medium, or all scattered blog, video, and news sources now you have only one.

You can update your skills through the most scattered news sources in one app and you are never bored because you select what you are interested in. RSS in your pocket is the best productivity tool to keep yourself updated with all infotainments. Improve your brain reading, researching, and learning from the internet with this source aggregator.

-Download, select your skills, and Further will bring you blogs and videos.
-Read and watch videos to update your learning methods. The best productivity tool to enrich your skills.

Daily we see news about how Facebook, Twitter and Google algorithms are changing. They are filtering your feed, making some sources popular and leaving others forgotten. Just open Further app on your phone and select what you would like to learn. We help you with suggestions based on your previous actions so Further will be always updated with new stuff related to you needs.

Further is a mobile application for lifelong learners, it's the most personal news reader that only shows you what matters to your learning. Books, videos, articles and blogs are scattered on the internet and difficult to find. With Further you can select your skills and receive only relevant content which will enrich your knowledge and help you advance your career or start your business.
descriptionShort: Read News and Blogs, Watch Videos & Update Learning - Productivity

Further is your mobile app for reading, learning, and sharing great content for Lifelong Learners.

Why?

Because we are lifelong learners too.

Further is a mobile application that aims to help lifelong learners filter and personalize free internet. Download Further, select your skills and Further will bring you blogs and videos. Read and watch videos to update your learning methods. Best productivity tool to enrich your skills without ads or bias.

You can update your skills through the most scattered news sources in one app and you are never bored because you select what you are interested in. RSS in your pocket is the best productivity tool to keep yourself updated with all infotainments. Improve your brain reading, researching, and learning from the internet with this source aggregator.

Further is an AI-powered app that filters and personalizes free internet content to help you learn faster, and better. It saves you time from searching all scattered blog, video, and news sources while learning one topic-skill-interest.

The app will show you how to speed up learning, and focus your free time on what matters most.

The only tool to turn daily productivity and learning into verifiable badges to track progress, upskill, find a job or increase the salary.

Open your door to the world of free internet with Further, a mobile app that allows lifelong learners to filter and personalize content. Of course, you can read and watch as much as you want, but that is not it. You can read, learn and share with your friends. With Further, you learn while you're commuting, drinking coffee or going for exercise.

Our goal is to provide lifelong learners a mobile application that can filter and personalize the free Internet to their learning journey. The Further app allows users to read and watch online content that will help them develop their skills in various topics. That way, the user can focus more on learning and maintaining control over their data input.

Further is the best app for lifelong learners. Watch, read and learn every day wherever you want.

Search for what you like!

Reading a blog or watching a Youtube video can make you learn skills. This is informal learning. Informal learning consists 75% of our whole learning And we’ve never taken into consideration informal learning while applying for a job or upskilling ourselves. Because there has been no way to prove it – Until Now. Further will allow you to develop and verify your skills with daily learning.

Focused learning for social, economic, and personal development.


-Further is the best productivity tool to enrich your skills
-Read and watch videos to update your learning methods
-Download, select your skills, and Further will bring you blogs and videos.
-Read and watch videos to update your learning methods. The best productivity tool to enrich your skills.

Just open Further app on your phone and select what you would like to learn. We help you with suggestions based on your previous actions so Further will be always updated with new stuff related to your needs.

Further is a mobile application for lifelong learners, it's the most personal news reader that only shows you what matters to your learning. Books, videos, articles, and blogs are scattered on the internet and difficult to find. With Further you can select your skills and receive only relevant content which will enrich your knowledge and help you advance your career or start your business.
descriptionShort: Filter sources and reach curated content for your interests. Be productive.

title: Further: Get Smarter Every Day

container.value: İstiklal Caddesi Beyoğlu İş Merkezi, D:Kat 2, 34434 Beyoğlu

creator: Sertifier Eğitim Teknolojileri Anonim Şirketi
descriptionHtml:
Filtered internet for your interests and skills

Further is your mobile app for reading, learning, and sharing great content for Lifelong Learners.

Why?

Because we are lifelong learners too.

Further is a mobile application that aims to help lifelong learners filter and personalize free internet. Download Further, select your skills and Further will bring you blogs and videos. Read and watch videos to update your learning methods. Best productivity tool to enrich your skills without ads or bias.

You can update your skills through the most scattered news sources in one app and you are never bored because you select what you are interested in. RSS in your pocket is the best productivity tool to keep yourself updated with all infotainments. Improve your brain reading, researching, and learning from the internet with this source aggregator.

Further is an AI-powered app that filters and personalizes free internet content to help you learn faster, and better. It saves you time from searching all scattered blog, video, and news sources while learning one topic-skill-interest.

The app will show you how to speed up learning, and focus your free time on what matters most.

The only tool to turn daily productivity and learning into verifiable badges to track progress, upskill, find a job or increase the salary.

Open your door to the world of free internet with Further, a mobile app that allows lifelong learners to filter and personalize content. Of course, you can read and watch as much as you want, but that is not it. You can read, learn and share with your friends. With Further, you learn while you're commuting, drinking coffee or going for exercise.

Our goal is to provide lifelong learners a mobile application that can filter and personalize the free Internet to their learning journey. The Further app allows users to read and watch online content that will help them develop their skills in various topics. That way, the user can focus more on learning and maintaining control over their data input.

Further is the best app for lifelong learners. Watch, read and learn every day wherever you want.

Search for what you like!

Reading a blog or watching a Youtube video can make you learn skills. This is informal learning. Informal learning consists 75% of our whole learning And we’ve never taken into consideration informal learning while applying for a job or upskilling ourselves. Because there has been no way to prove it – Until Now. Further will allow you to develop and verify your skills with daily learning.

Focused learning for social, economic, and personal development.


-Further is the best productivity tool to enrich your skills
-Read and watch videos to update your learning methods
-Download, select your skills, and Further will bring you blogs and videos.
-Read and watch videos to update your learning methods. The best productivity tool to enrich your skills.

Just open Further app on your phone and select what you would like to learn. We help you with suggestions based on your previous actions so Further will be always updated with new stuff related to your needs.

Further is a mobile application for lifelong learners, it's the most personal news reader that only shows you what matters to your learning. Books, videos, articles, and blogs are scattered on the internet and difficult to find. With Further you can select your skills and receive only relevant content which will enrich your knowledge and help you advance your career or start your business.

creator: Sertifier Eğitim Teknolojileri Anonim Şirketi
descriptionHtml:
Further is a mobile application that presents you with 10 fresh contents every day, enhancing your reading/ watching experience.
Moreover, all of the content we present is tailored to your interests and liking!

Go Further with +50000 users around the globe!

Explore: AI powered personalization, daily digest, badges, text-to-speech, personal library, sharing made easy, reading mode

WHY?
Because we know that your time is precious and the content on the internet has no end.
This is why we are aiming to bring you personalized content from best publications, so you don’t have to worry about scanning thousands of content and publications.

WHY? (Updated)
Because we know that your time is precious and the content on the internet has no end. You may spend hours surfing through the net looking for a specific piece of content, however, how efficient would it be?
This is why we are aiming to bring you personalized content from best publications, while also awarding your progress with verifiable badges on varied skill sets.
So that you can always stay motivated and on track with your goals with Further!


HOW?

- Download Further and select your desired topics
- Further will bring you articles and videos from 100+ publications according to your interests
- Start learning and track your progress with badges
- Check out Daily Digest for fresh content every day
- Create your library, organize your articles and videos
- The more you read, the better AI powered engine gets to know you
- Enjoy!

HIGHLIGHTS

- +2M articles and videos
- +100 publications at your fingertips
- Ad-free content consumption
- Listen to your articles with text-to-speech feature
- Track your progress with badges
- Personalized content suggestions with AI
- Explore new topics and discover new publications
- Organize and personalize your library

YOUR TAILORED DAILY DIGEST

Receive 10 fresh articles tailored to your interests every day. Train our AI powered engine by bookmark the ones that you want to read. The more you interact, the better our suggestions get.

LISTEN ANYWHERE, ANYTIME

With our text-to-speech feature, listen to any articles anytime you want. Incorporate your learning habits to your daily life. It does not matter if you are washing dishes, driving, exercising! With Further, learning and updating your skills is always convenient.

VERIFY YOUR PROGRESS WITH BADGES

As you consume content within a specific skill set, Further awards you with verifiable badges. Track your progress and share your badges to showcase your skills. You can add your badges to your LinkedIn profile, or share in any social media platform.

GO EVEN FURTHER WITH PREMIUM

Even though, we have a diverse range of free features, feel free to update to premium for a Further experience. Get your hands on unlimited content consumption, reader mode, and text-to-speech features.
descriptionShort: New content for your personal growth daily, tailored specifically for you!

descriptionHtml:
Further is a mobile application that presents you with 10 fresh contents every day, enhancing your reading/ watching experience.
Moreover, all of the content we present is tailored to your interests and liking!

Go Further with +50000 users around the globe!

Explore: AI-powered personalization, daily digest, reading mode, badges, text-to-speech, personal library, sharing made easy

WHY?

Because your time is precious, and the content on the internet has no end. You may spend hours surfing through the net looking for a specific piece of content; however, how efficient is this really?
This is why we are bringing you personalized content from the best publications while also awarding your progress with verifiable badges on varied skill sets. All the content you can want from hundreds of topics is available in your pocket now! Read articles and watch videos personalized to your interests, and get daily recommendations from AI.

Always stay motivated and on track with your goals with Further!


HOW?

- Download Further and select your desired topics
- Further will bring you articles and videos from 100+ publications according to your interests
- Start learning and track your progress with badges
- Check out Daily Digest for fresh content every day
- Personalize your library, organize your bookmarks, and curate lists
- The more you read, the better our AI-powered engine gets to know you

HIGHLIGHTS

- +2M articles and videos
- +100 publications at your fingertips
- Ad-free content consumption
- Listen to your articles with our text-to-speech feature
- Track your progress with badges
- Personalized content suggestions with AI
- Explore new topics and discover new publications
- Organize and personalize your library
- Subscribe with your email to receive your newsletter

YOUR TAILORED DAILY DIGEST

Receive 10 fresh and refined articles tailored to your interests every day. Train our AI engine by bookmarking the ones that you want to read. The more you interact, the better our suggestions get. Receive smart insights on any topic you can imagine with Further!

LISTEN ANYWHERE, ANYTIME

With our text-to-speech feature, listen to any articles anytime you want. Incorporate your learning habits into your daily life. It does not matter if you are washing dishes, driving, or exercising! With Further, learning and updating your skills is always convenient. Promoting your personal growth is easier than ever!

VERIFY YOUR PROGRESS WITH BADGES

As you consume content within a specific skill set, Further awards you with verifiable badges. Track your progress and share your badges to showcase your skills. You can add your badges to your LinkedIn profile or share them on any social media platform. Consume articles from any topic that are related to your business and have a verifiable badge to prove your competence.

GO EVEN FURTHER WITH PREMIUM

Even though we have a diverse range of free features, feel free to update to premium for a Further experience. Get your hands on unlimited content, reader mode, and text-to-speech features. With our premium plan, getting smart insights and promoting your daily growth is easier than ever.

POSSIBILITIES ARE ENDLESS

With Further, all the content you desire is in your pocket. Do you want to access BBC News? We got you! Articles about digital marketing, Apple news, dieting, sports, UX design, Google News, Business Insider, and so much more, you name it. Our library of written content and videos has no limits, and you can personalize it the way you want.


You can personalize Further to your specific needs. Consume written content to help with your business, learn more about your hobbies or support your studies as a student. Whatever reason you choose to use Further, you will have the badges to show your process!

Bookmark any content you want to save in your library and curate lists to organize your bookmarks. Get back to reading them any time you want and share your lists with friends and colleagues.
